mapper.sql: t.id AS id,t.type AS type,t.code AS code,t.faultCode AS faultCode,t.state AS state,t.remark AS remark,t.productionLine AS productionLine,t.station AS station,t.happenTime AS happenTime,t.repairStartTime AS repairStartTime,t.repairEndTime AS repairEndTime,t.siteId AS siteId, t.faultLevel AS faultLevel,t.repairNo AS repairNo
mapper.select: SELECT DEVICE_NAME AS deviceName, DEVICE_MODEL AS deviceModel, PRODUCT_LINE_BO AS productLineBo, STATION_BO AS stationBo, STATE AS state FROM M_DEVICE WHERE DEVICE = #{code}
mapper.update: update andon_record set STATE = #{state}, REPAIR_MAN = #{user}, REPAIR_TIME = #{date}, REPAIR_REMARK = #{repairMethod}, CLOSE_TIME = #{date}, CLOSE_MAN = #{user} where SITE = #{site} and REPAIR_NO = #{repairNo}
mapper.select:
select t.id as id, t.repairNo as repairNo, t.state as state, t.code as code, md.DEVICE_NAME as deviceName, t.faultCode as faultCode, mrf.remark as faultDesc, t.createTime as createTime, t.productionLine as productionLine, t.station as station, t.happenTime as happenTime, t.repairStartTime as repairStartTime, t.repairEndTime as repairEndTime, t.siteId as siteId from m_repair_corrective_maintenance t left join m_device md on t.code = md.DEVICE and t.siteId = md.SITE left join m_repair_fault mrf on t.faultCode = mrf.faultCode and t.siteId = mrf.siteId left join mm_repair_corrective_user mrcu on t.planRepairUserId = mrcu.REPAIR_USER_ID
order by t.createTime DESC

SELECT m.id, m.repairNo, m.faultDesc as remark, m.repairUserName as planRepairUserName, m.repairMethod as repairProcrssDesc, m.faultCode, m.happenTime, m.repairStartTime, m.repairEndTime FROM m_repair_corrective_maintenance m WHERE m.code = #{params.code} AND m.siteId = #{params.site} AND m.state = 2 ORDER BY m.createTime DESC
SELECT * FROM m_product_line WHERE BO = #{productionLine} AND state = 1
SELECT * FROM m_station WHERE BO = #{station} AND state = 1
SELECT count(*) FROM m_repair_corrective_maintenance WHERE siteId = #{site} AND state = 0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM m_repair_corrective_maintenance repair INNER JOIN m_repair_corrective_user u on u.REPAIR_ID = repair.id WHERE repair.state = 0 AND repair.siteId = #{site} AND u.REPAIR_USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY u.REPAIR_USER_ID
